name: mp_diff
author: Unknown
description: Generates a file with specific motion parameter calculations useful for accounting for 'spin history' effects and other variations not accounted for by motion correction.

inputs.description: Input file containing registration parameters (e.g., regparam.dat)
inputs.name: Registration parameter file

inputs.description: Output file with differenced registration parameters (e.g., diffregparam.dat)
inputs.name: Differenced registration parameter file

output-files.description: File containing squared motion parameters, temporal difference of motion parameters, and squared differenced values.
output-files.name: Output file
